meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>thunder</kanji> <kanji>rain</kanji> is a rain that's coming with thunder. For all intents and purposes, if you see this, you'll think <vocabulary>thunderstorm</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the on'yomi readings. For 雨, you learned it with 雨天. So you should be able to put them together!
